TopicTitle: KSP stuck on loading (Kopernicus mentioned in logs)

Articles.Content:
Good Morning! 

whenever I start KSP it gets stuck in the loading screen, not sure exactly what caused it since I didn't modify my install but it seems to involve Kopernicus? 

anyway the KSP log is here: https://pastebin.com/nn4mgtUj

and the player log:

https://pastebin.com/PfE5pxHN

Try deleting the ModuleManager cache files (ModuleManager.conficcache, .configSHA, .physics and .tech tree) and reloading the game?

A mod list would help.
